channel.title: Data Model on Documaster Noark5 API
channel.description: Recent content in Data Model on Documaster Noark5 API

item.title: Overview
item.description: Entity Felds Documaster Noark5 API entities have two types of fields : Data Fields - fields which contain properties of the entity. Data fields support the following types : string, date, timestamp, number and boolean. Reference Fields - fields which represent links to other entities in the model, like foreign keys in a relational database model (prefixed with ref). A reference field can represent a one to one or one to many relations.
